name: Cloyster
description: CLOYSTER that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.effect: This Pokémon always hits five times with two-to-five-hit moves, such as icicle spear.  It also bypasses the accuracy checks on triple kick's second and third hits.
abilities.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
